verses.verse: Praise<WH1984> you the LORD.<WH3050> Praise<WH1984> you the name<WH8034> of the LORD;<WH3068> praise<WH1984> him, O you servants<WH5650> of the LORD.<WH3068>
You that stand<WH5975> in the house<WH1004> of the LORD,<WH3068> in the courts<WH2691> of the house<WH1004> of our God.<WH430>
Praise<WH1984> the LORD;<WH3050> for the LORD<WH3068> is good:<WH2896> sing<WH2167> praises to his name;<WH8034> for it is pleasant.<WH5273>
For the LORD<WH3050> has chosen<WH977> Jacob<WH3290> to himself, and Israel<WH3478> for his peculiar<WH5459> treasure.
For I know<WH3045> that the LORD<WH3068> is great,<WH1419> and that our Lord<WH113> is above all<WH3605> gods.<WH430>
Whatever<WH3605> <WH834> the LORD<WH3068> pleased,<WH2654> that did<WH6213> he in heaven,<WH8064> and in earth,<WH776> in the seas,<WH3220> and all<WH3605> deep<WH8415> places.

He causes the vapors<WH5387> to ascend<WH5927> from the ends<WH7097> of the earth;<WH776> he makes<WH6213> lightning<WH1300> for the rain;<WH4306> he brings<WH3318> the wind<WH7307> out of his treasuries.<WH214>
Who smote<WH5221> the firstborn<WH1060> of Egypt,<WH4714> both of man<WH120> and beast.<WH929>
Who sent<WH7971> tokens<WH226> and wonders<WH4159> into the middle<WH8432> of you, O Egypt,<WH4714> on Pharaoh,<WH6547> and on all<WH3605> his servants.<WH5650>
Who smote<WH5221> great<WH7227> nations,<WH1471> and slew<WH2026> mighty<WH6099> kings;<WH4428>
Sihon<WH5511> king<WH4428> of the Amorites,<WH567> and Og<WH5747> king<WH4428> of Bashan,<WH1316> and all<WH3605> the kingdoms<WH4467> of Canaan:<WH3667>
And gave<WH5414> their land<WH776> for an heritage,<WH5159> an heritage<WH5159> to Israel<WH3478> his people.<WH5971>
Your name,<WH8034> O LORD,<WH3068> endures for ever;<WH5769> and your memorial,<WH2143> O LORD,<WH3068> throughout all generations.<WH1755>
For the LORD<WH3068> will judge<WH1777> his people,<WH5971> and he will repent<WH5162> himself concerning<WH5921> his servants.<WH5650>
The idols<WH6091> of the heathen<WH1471> are silver<WH3701> and gold,<WH2091> the work<WH4639> of men's<WH120> hands.<WH3027>
They have mouths,<WH6310> but they speak<WH1696> not; eyes<WH5869> have they, but they see<WH7200> not;
They have ears,<WH241> but they hear<WH238> not; neither<WH369> is there any breath<WH7307> in their mouths.<WH6310>
They that make<WH6213> them are like<WH3644> to them: so is every<WH3605> one that trusts<WH982> in them.
Bless<WH1288> the LORD,<WH3068> O house<WH1004> of Israel:<WH3478> bless<WH1288> the LORD,<WH3068> O house<WH1004> of Aaron:<WH175>
Bless<WH1288> the LORD,<WH3068> O house<WH1004> of Levi:<WH3878> you that fear<WH3373> the LORD,<WH3068> bless<WH1288> the LORD.<WH3068>
Blessed<WH1288> be the LORD<WH3068> out of Zion,<WH6726> which dwells<WH7931> at Jerusalem.<WH3389> Praise<WH1984> you the LORD.<WH3050>
